commodity_quantity.description: Type of power quantity this PEBC.AllowedLimitRange applies to

limit_type.description: Indicates if this ranges applies to the upper limit or the lower limit

range_boundary.description: Boundaries of the power range of this PEBC.AllowedLimitRange. The CEM is allowed to choose values within this range for the power envelope for the limit as described in limit_type. The start of the range shall be smaller or equal than the end of the range.

abnormal_condition_only.description: Indicates if this PEBC.AllowedLimitRange may only be used during an abnormal condition
